questions.question: What is a class in OOP?
What does encapsulation mean?
options: Hiding the internal state of an object
Creating multiple instances of a class
questions.correctAnswer: Hiding the internal state of an object

questions.question: What is inheritance?
options: A mechanism to define new classes based on existing ones
A way to create multiple objects
questions.correctAnswer: A mechanism to define new classes based on existing ones

questions.question: What is polymorphism?
options: The ability to take on multiple forms
Creating a new class from an existing class
questions.correctAnswer: The ability to take on multiple forms

questions.question: What is a constructor?
options: A function that initializes an object
A method to destroy an object
questions.correctAnswer: A function that initializes an object

questions.question: What is a destructor?
options: A function that destroys an object
A method that initializes an object
questions.correctAnswer: A function that destroys an object

questions.question: What is an access specifier?
options: A keyword that defines the visibility of class members
questions.correctAnswer: A keyword that defines the visibility of class members

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'this' pointer?
options: To refer to the current object
questions.correctAnswer: To refer to the current object

questions.question: What is an abstract class?
options: A class that cannot be instantiated
A class that can be instantiated
questions.correctAnswer: A class that cannot be instantiated
